# 1917 Swarthmore Quakers football team

The 1917 Swarthmore Quakers football team was an American football team that represented Swarthmore College as an independent during the 1917 college football season. The team compiled a 6â€“2 record and outscored opponents by a total of 238 to 40. Bill Roper was the head coach.
